description:
Gold Standard Auctions, a dynamic and innovative auction house, is seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Data Entry Specialist to join our team. This is a unique opportunity to gain valuable experience and exposure in the auction industry by working for a pioneering company.

Position overview:

The Data Entry Associate will play a key role in accurately and systematically recording

collectibles for auction. Responsibilities include data entry, cataloging, and database

maintenance. This role requires attention to detail and the ability to work both quickly and precisely.

Key Responsibilities

● Maintaining data accuracy

● Demonstrating strong organizational skills

● Working effectively within a team of specialists

● Maintaining strict attention to detail

● Adhering to stringent security protocols

Qualifications:

● High school diploma or equivalent

● Proficient in data entry and database management software

● Excellent organizational and time-management skills

● Strong communication and interpersonal skills

Job Description

● This is an onsite position from Monday to Friday; occasional weekend work may be

required.

● This position has the potential to handle valuable merchandise.

● You may be required to work in other areas of the organization as needed.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $20.00 - $25.00 per hour

Benefits:

Dental insurance
Health insurance
Paid time off
Vision insurance

Schedule:

Monday to Friday

Ability to Commute:

Farmers Branch, TX 75234 (Required)

Ability to Relocate:

Farmers Branch, TX 75234: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person
